com.fluidops.ajax.components

Class FUpload

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fluidops.ajax.components.FComponent
      • com.fluidops.ajax.components.FUpload
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FEventListener

    public class FUpload
extends FComponent
    ajax file upload using a small IFrame. The POST request is picked up by the main servlet com.fluidops.ajax.AjaxServlet
    Author:
    aeb

      • setEnableDnDFileUpload

        public void setEnableDnDFileUpload(boolean enableDnDFileUpload)
        adds a drop area div underneath the upload input field. This is ignored for IE browsers TODO: perform client side check via JS which is safer / more exact
        Parameters:
        enableDnDFileUpload -

      • isMultiFileUpload

        public boolean isMultiFileUpload()

      • setMultiFileUpload

        public void setMultiFileUpload(boolean multiFileUpload)
        adds the "multiple" attribute to the upload component. If the browser supports it (FF, Chrome), onUpload() is called multiple times. If not (IE), the browser simply ignores it
        Parameters:
        multiFileUpload -
